original_text: Then David left Gath and he went to a cave near Adullam. His brothers and his father's family discovered where he had gone. So they all went to visit him. Samuel 21 Samuel 23
korean_text: 그러므로 다윗이 그 곳을 떠나 아둘람 굴로 도망하매 그의 형제와 아버지의 온 집이 듣고 그리로 내려가서 그에게 이르렀고

sentences.original_text: and he went to a cave near Adullam
His brothers and his father's family
So they all went to visit him
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 모두 그를 방문하러 갔다
